item.description:
Dinner and dancing with Four on the Floor!
We have never had a bad time dancing with our friends...
Just chatted with Kevin from Four on the Floor and the band is really happy that so many of us are going on Friday to see them!!! If you haven't already replied please do so now but read the dinner message below.
Hope to see you there. :-)

Place: Foccacia Ristorante & Trattoria, Wilmington MA
Located at the intersection of Rte 38 and 129, accessible from Rtes 93, 495 or 128.

DINNER 7:30 --- A reservation was made for up to 20 people, the maximum they could accommodate in the lounge area. If you would like to come for dinner but did not say yes in advance you may have to be seated away from the group. PLEASE NOTE THAT MEMBERS WHO RESPONDED YES SHOULD BE SEATED FIRST. THANKS.

Dancing: 8:30 pm - 12:00 am
URL: http://www.focacciafo...

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Four on the Floor in Wilmington
